Setting.Description: Dynamic fields shown in the ticket close screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Description: Runs an initial wildcard search of the existing customer company when accessing the AgentPaS module.

Setting.Description: List of all PaS events to be displayed in the GUI.

Setting.Name: PaS::EventModulePost###100-UpdatePaS
Setting.Description: Event module that performs an update statement on TicketIndex to rename the queue name there if needed and if StaticDB is actually used.
